metadata.title: Actor Interaction Test Game
metadata.description: Test game for actor interaction integration tests (UC1-UC8).
metadata.author: Actor Interaction Tests

locations.name: Central Hub
locations.description: A circular chamber with passages leading in all directions. This is the heart of the test dungeon, connecting to all the different test scenarios.

north.name: archway
north.description: An archway leads north to a dusty library.

west.name: trail
west.description: A forest trail leads west into the woods.

east.name: path
east.description: A worn path leads east toward the sound of water.

south.name: stone steps
south.description: Stone steps lead south to an ancient temple.

northeast.name: garden gate
northeast.description: A wooden gate leads northeast to a walled garden.

locations.name: Ancient Library
locations.description: A dusty library filled with crumbling scrolls and moldy tomes. A scholar sits at a desk, looking unwell. Stairs descend to a basement.

south.name: archway
south.description: An archway leads back south to the central hub.

down.name: stairs
down.description: Stone stairs descend into a dark basement.

locations.name: Spore-Filled Basement
locations.description: A damp basement filled with floating spores. The air is thick with fungal particles. Different areas have varying spore concentrations.

up.name: stairs
up.description: Stone stairs lead back up to the library.

locations.name: Forest Clearing
locations.description: A moonlit clearing in the forest. A pack of wolves has made this their territory. To the north, a rocky outcrop marks the entrance to their den.

east.name: trail
east.description: A trail leads east back to the central hub.

north.name: rocky path
north.description: A rocky path leads north to a dark den entrance.

south.name: road
south.description: A dirt road leads south through the forest.

locations.name: Wolf Den
locations.description: A shallow cave that serves as the wolf pack's den. Bones are scattered about and the smell is overwhelming.

south.name: rocky path
south.description: The rocky path leads south back to the clearing.

locations.name: Old Dock
locations.description: A weathered wooden dock extends over murky water. A rope ladder descends into the depths. An air bladder hangs from a post.

west.name: path
west.description: A path leads west back to the central hub.

down.name: rope ladder
down.description: A rope ladder descends into the water below.

locations.name: Underwater Cave
locations.description: A flooded cave chamber. Shafts of light filter down from above. A sailor struggles to stay afloat.

up.name: rope ladder
up.description: A rope ladder leads up to the dock.

locations.name: Temple Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to an ancient temple. Stone columns frame a passage leading deeper inside. A rusty sword lies abandoned on the ground.

north.name: stone steps
north.description: Stone steps lead north back to the central hub.

south.name: passage
south.description: A dark passage leads south into the temple sanctum.

locations.name: Temple Sanctum
locations.description: The inner sanctum of the temple. Stone golems stand guard at the center, their eyes glowing faintly. Alcoves line the walls.

north.name: passage
north.description: A passage leads north back to the entrance.

locations.name: Walled Garden
locations.description: A peaceful walled garden filled with medicinal plants. Various herbs grow in neat beds, some clearly marked with warning signs. A small hut stands at the far end.

southwest.name: garden gate
southwest.description: A wooden gate leads southwest back to the central hub.

north.name: door
north.description: A wooden door leads into the healer's hut.

locations.name: Healer's Hut
locations.description: A cozy hut filled with dried herbs, bottles of tinctures, and the smell of healing salves. A wise healer tends to their work here.

south.name: door
south.description: A wooden door leads back out to the garden.

locations.name: Forest Road
locations.description: A rutted dirt road winds through the dense forest. An overturned cart lies to the side, with an injured merchant slumped against it.

north.name: road
north.description: The road leads north back to the forest clearing.

south.name: road
south.description: The road continues south toward the town.

locations.name: Town Gate
locations.description: A sturdy wooden gate marks the entrance to the town. Guards stand watch, eyeing travelers with suspicion.

east.name: tunnel
east.description: A dark tunnel leads east into an abandoned mine.

locations.name: Spider Gallery
locations.description: A large underground chamber covered in thick spider webs. The silken strands glisten ominously. Multiple alcoves branch off from the main area.

west.name: tunnel
west.description: A tunnel leads west back toward the town.

down.name: stairs
down.description: A crumbling stairway descends deeper underground.

locations.name: Main Hall
locations.description: A grand hall with cracked marble floors and faded tapestries. A damaged stone statue stands vigil near the far wall, frozen mid-gesture.

up.name: stairs
up.description: Stone stairs lead back up to the spider gallery.

properties.description: The entrance area of the basement. The air has a faint musty smell but the spore concentration is low here.
The center of the basement where spores are thickest. Visibility is reduced and breathing is difficult.
The shallow end of the underwater cave where light still reaches.
The deep end of the cave. Crushing pressure makes breathing equipment less effective.
The open center of the sanctum where the golems stand guard. No cover here.
A recessed alcove in the temple wall. The stone pillars provide good cover.
The entrance area of the gallery. Webs are thin here, mostly decorative strands.
The heart of the spider nest. Thick webs cover everything, and egg sacs hang from the ceiling.

items.name: silvermoss
items.description: A clump of silvery moss with antifungal properties. It glows faintly with a soft blue light.

items.name: venison
items.description: A haunch of fresh deer meat. It looks appetizing to any carnivore.

items.name: air bladder
items.description: An inflated pig's bladder that can provide air underwater. It won't last forever.

items.name: rusty sword
items.description: An old iron sword covered in rust. Still sharp enough to be dangerous.

items.name: stone pillar
items.description: A thick stone pillar that could provide cover from attacks.

items.name: nightshade
items.description: A dark purple flower with a sinister beauty. Warning signs are posted near it.

properties.description_with_herbalism: A deadly nightshade plant. Its toxic oils can cause severe poisoning on contact. Best handled with gloves.

items.name: healing herb
items.description: A leafy green plant with a pleasant smell.

properties.description_with_herbalism: Calendula, an excellent wound healer. Apply as a poultice for best effect.

items.name: gold coins
items.description: A small pouch of gold coins clinking together.

items.name: bandages
items.description: Clean cloth bandages, useful for stopping bleeding.

items.name: merchant's pouch
items.description: A leather pouch containing the merchant's grateful reward.

items.name: torch
items.description: A wooden torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. It burns with a bright flame.

items.name: stone chisel
items.description: A mason's chisel designed for working with stone. Perfect for repairing stone constructs.

player.name: Adventurer
player.description: A hardy adventurer testing the actor interaction systems.

npc_scholar.name: Scholar Aldric
npc_scholar.description: A frail scholar with pale skin and dark circles under his eyes. He coughs occasionally and seems weakened by illness.

npc_alpha_wolf.name: Alpha Wolf
npc_alpha_wolf.description: A large grey wolf with piercing yellow eyes. It stands protectively in front of the pack, teeth bared.

npc_wolf_1.name: Grey Wolf
npc_wolf_1.description: A lean grey wolf that watches you warily, following the alpha's lead.

npc_wolf_2.name: Brown Wolf
npc_wolf_2.description: A smaller brown wolf that stays close to the pack, ears flattened.

npc_sailor.name: Drowning Sailor
npc_sailor.description: A sailor struggling to stay afloat. His face is turning blue from lack of air.

npc_diving_golem.name: Diving Golem
npc_diving_golem.description: A stone construct designed for underwater salvage. It has no need to breathe.

npc_guardian_golem_1.name: Stone Guardian
npc_guardian_golem_1.description: A massive stone golem with glowing runes carved into its chest. It guards the temple sanctum with unwavering vigilance.

npc_guardian_golem_2.name: Iron Guardian
npc_guardian_golem_2.description: A slightly smaller golem made of dark iron. It moves faster than its stone counterpart.

npc_healer.name: Wise Healer Mira
npc_healer.description: An elderly woman with kind eyes and hands stained from years of working with herbs. She offers her healing services to those who can pay.

npc_merchant.name: Injured Merchant
npc_merchant.description: A portly man in traveling clothes, bleeding from a wound on his arm. He looks grateful for any help.

npc_spider_queen.name: Spider Queen
npc_spider_queen.description: A massive spider with glistening fangs dripping venom. She sits at the center of her web domain.

npc_spider_worker_1.name: Giant Spider
npc_spider_worker_1.description: A large hairy spider with multiple gleaming eyes. It skitters along the walls.

npc_spider_worker_2.name: Web Spinner
npc_spider_worker_2.description: A pale spider constantly spinning silk. Its webs are particularly sticky.

npc_broken_statue.name: Broken Statue
npc_broken_statue.description: A once-majestic stone statue of a warrior. Cracks run through its torso and one arm is missing. Despite the damage, there's a sense of dormant power.
